DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria UTI Group : 1 . At least 2 recurrent UTIs within last year 2 . Written inform consent Inclusion Criteria Normal Group : 1 . No UTI within past 5 year 2 . Written inform consent Exclusion Criteria Both Groups : 1 . Active UTI 2 . Urinary tract anomalies 3 . Evidence neurogenic bladder 4 . Known immunodeficiency 5 .
